By far the best meal I had while in Spain.  From Madrid to San Sebastian and then to Barcelona Pirineus was the best.  It sits on a small corner in a neighborhood area right next to the Joanic metro stop.  A few tables outside, maybe another 6 inside and a bar area make up the place.  The two things that really set it apart are the freshly made tapas and cooked meals and the service.  The staff is so friendly.  They were some of the nicest people we met in Barcelona.  After finding the place by accident we had to come again the next night.  Great home cooked meals from people that know there stuff.  Come here and spend a nice long dinner with family you've never met; you won't be disappointed.
